item.title: Gmail+―Google、すでにGmail/Google+の連携に着手
item.description: [New]: Gmail+―Google、すでにGmail/Google+の連携に着手 http://bit.ly/pJpZxp
item.content:encoded: [New]: Gmail+―Google、すでにGmail/Google+の連携に着手 http://bit.ly/pJpZxp 私が1箇月間メールを止めるという大胆な実験を始める決断ができた理由の一つはGoogle+の出現だった。これによって誰かが私にメッセージを届ける必要がある場合、もうひとつの有力なチャンネルが確保された。それに加えて、Google+の登場でGmailはさらに古ぼけて見えるようになった。念のために言っておくが、Gmailは既存のメールサービスの中で飛び抜けて優秀である。しかしメールサービスであることには変わりない―メールというのは何十年も前のテクノロジーだ。GoogleはGmailに優れたフロントエンドと強力な検索機能を付け加えた。しかしGoogle+、Facebook、Twitterなどの新世代のツールに比べると、1080pの液晶テレビの時代に白黒テレビを見ているような古臭さを感じざるをえない。実のところ私はメールには消えてもらいたいと思っている。もしかするとGoogleのおかげでそれが可能になるかもしれない。 Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: techcrunch.com

item.title: the weezer cruise
item.description: Set sail with Weezer? http://t.co/8C6iSr9
item.content:encoded: Set sail with Weezer? http://t.co/8C6iSr9 Weezer is hitting the open seas and you are invited! The Weezer Cruise sails January 19-23, 2012 on the Carnival Destiny from Miami to Cozumel. This floating music festival will feature live shows from Weezer, plus special guests Dinosaur Jr, Sebadoh, Gene Ween and Dave Dreiwitz, Wavves, The Antlers, Yuck, Free Energy, Boom Bip, J. Mascis, Lou Barlow, Keepaway, Ozma, The Nervous Wreckords, The Knocks, Sleeper Agent, and Yacht Rock Revue. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: theweezercruise.com

item.content:encoded: Fresh doubt cast on Obama's health care story - http://bit.ly/nLnJyJ #tcot #p2 During the 2008 presidential campaign, Barack Obama often discussed his mother's struggle with cancer. item.description: Obama says he cannot guarantee Social Security checks will go out on August 3 http://bit.ly/n6beNB
item.content:encoded: Obama says he cannot guarantee Social Security checks will go out on August 3 http://bit.ly/n6beNB * Political Hotsheet Obama: No guarantee for Social Security checks 4 of 9 * Crimesider Report: Anthony juror left town in fear for life 5 of 9 * U.S. "Sister Wives" clan challenging anti-bigamy law 6 of 9 * World Afghan president's powerful half-brother killed 7 of 9 * Crimesider Trial near in case of python that killed Fla. tot 8 of 9 * U.S. Slain gay student pushed limits, witness says 9 of 9 Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: cbsnews.com

item.title: Piers Morgan Knew Award Winning Scoop Was Hacked - Guy Fawkes' blog
item.description: Piers Morgan Knew Award Winning Scoop Was Hacked http://t.co/HTZ6XIL
item.content:encoded: Piers Morgan Knew Award Winning Scoop Was Hacked http://t.co/HTZ6XIL Last week Trinity Mirror Group were forced to issue a statement denying that they had sourced a British Press Award-winning 2002 scoop from phone-hacking. They claim “Trinity Mirror’s position is clear. Our journalists work within the criminal law and the PCC code of conduct.” That’s not what their former journalists say though. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: order-order.com
